sentences.sentence: He was attractive and averagely intelligent.
An averagely fit person can master easy ski runs within a few days.
sentences.translation: 中等健康的人几天内就能驾驭初级的滑雪道。

sentences.sentence: The prism effect was put on the right and left lenses averagely by 1/2-1/3 degree of exophoria.
sentences.translation: 左右镜平均有1/ 2-1/3度的镜筒外加棱镜效应。
